item.description: This trail leaves from the Downes Brook parking area just east of Passaconaway Campground and 13.5 miles west of Conway on the Kancamagus Highway.The trail takes you to the summit of Mt.Hedgehog(2520').The grade is moderate and only the final sections require a little extra effort.The advantage in taking the loop in a clockwise direction is to view the Presidential Range and Mt.Washington as you reach the summit from the south.4.8 miles complete loop,elevation gain 1450'5 hours estimated time.
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: MOUNT HEDGEHOG
